abstract: Crowd of over 1,000 people, including several eminent New Yorkers, gathers at Carnegie Hall to honor late fashion photographer Bill Cunningham, who died in June at age 87.

headline.print_headline: Photographer Remembered as ‘the Eyes of New York’

snippet: Notables gather at Carnegie Hall to pay tribute to the photographer, who died in June at age 87....
lead_paragraph: Notables gather at Carnegie Hall to pay tribute to the photographer, who died in June at age 87.
